zh-cn: Franz Ferdinand Carl Ludwig Joseph Maria
弗朗茨·斐迪南·卡尔·路德维希·约瑟夫·马里亚
弗朗茨·斐迪南‧卡尔‧路德维希‧约瑟夫‧马里亚‧冯‧奥地利-埃斯特

death_place.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那共管领土萨拉热窝
death_place.en: Sarajevo, Condominium of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Austria-Hungary

description.zh-cn: 奥地利大公，奥匈帝国皇储及埃斯特大公，兼任奥匈陆军总司令。他于1914年在萨拉热窝遇刺，该事件（萨拉热窝事件）成为第一次世界大战的导火线。
description.en: Archduke of Austria, heir presumptive to the throne of Austria-Hungary, and Archduke of Austria-Este. His assassination in Sarajevo in 1914 (the Sarajevo incident) was the catalyst for World War I.

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国皇帝，弗朗茨·斐迪南的伯父。
description.en: Emperor of Austria-Hungary, paternal uncle of Franz Ferdinand.

nodes.id: 奥地利的卡尔·路德维希 (1833-1896)

zh-cn: 奥地利的卡尔·路德维希 (1833-1896)

description.zh-cn: 奥地利大公，奥皇弗兰茨·约瑟夫一世的弟弟，弗朗茨·斐迪南大公的父亲。
description.en: Archduke of Austria, younger brother of Emperor Franz Joseph I, and father of Archduke Franz Ferdinand.

nodes.id: 玛丽亚·安农齐亚塔 (两西西里公主)

zh-cn: 玛丽亚·安农齐亚塔 (两西西里公主)
两西西里的玛丽亚·安农齐亚塔
en: Princess Maria Annunciata of Bourbon-Two Sicilies

description.zh-cn: 两西西里公主，弗朗茨·斐迪南大公的母亲。
description.en: Princess of Bourbon-Two Sicilies, mother of Archduke Franz Ferdinand.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南大公的妻子，两人因贵贱通婚，其子女无皇位继承权。与丈夫一同在萨拉热窝事件中遇刺身亡。
description.en: Wife of Archduke Franz Ferdinand. Due to their morganatic marriage, their children had no rights to the throne. She was assassinated alongside her husband in the Sarajevo incident.

nodes.id: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

zh-cn: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国皇太子，弗兰茨·约瑟夫一世的独子。他在梅耶林惨案中自杀后，弗朗茨·斐迪南成为皇储。
description.en: Crown Prince of Austria-Hungary, the only son of Emperor Franz Joseph I. After his suicide in the Mayerling incident, Franz Ferdinand became the heir presumptive.

description.zh-cn: 指奥匈帝国皇太子鲁道夫与其情妇的殉情自杀事件。此事导致弗朗茨·斐迪南成为皇位的第一顺位继承人。
description.en: Refers to the murder-suicide of Crown Prince Rudolf of Austria and his mistress. This event led to Franz Ferdinand becoming the heir presumptive to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 一种塞尔维亚民族主义思想，其追随者因弗朗茨·斐迪南主张“三元联邦体制”而憎恨他。
description.en: A Serbian nationalist ideology whose followers hated Franz Ferdinand for his advocacy of a 'Trialist' federal system.

description.zh-cn: 塞尔维亚民族主义者，在萨拉热窝刺杀了弗朗茨·斐迪南大公及其妻子苏菲，引发了萨拉热窝事件。
description.en: A Serbian nationalist who assassinated Archduke Franz Ferdinand and his wife Sophie in Sarajevo, triggering the Sarajevo incident.

description.zh-cn: 指奥匈帝国皇储弗朗茨·斐迪南大公夫妇在萨拉热窝被刺杀的事件，此事件成为第一次世界大战的导火线。
description.en: The assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand, heir to the Austro-Hungarian throne, and his wife in Sarajevo. This event was the immediate cause of World War I.

description.zh-cn: 一场始于欧洲的全球性战争，萨拉热窝事件是其直接导火索。
description.en: A global war originating in Europe, directly triggered by the Sarajevo incident.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利城市，弗朗茨·斐迪南大公的出生地。
description.en: A city in Austria, birthplace of Archduke Franz Ferdinand.

description.zh-cn: 波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那首都，弗朗茨·斐迪南大公夫妇在此地遇刺身亡。
description.en: The capital city of Bosnia and Herzegovina, where Archduke Franz Ferdinand and his wife were assassinated.

description.zh-cn: 一个存在于1867年至1918年间的中欧二元君主国。弗朗茨·斐迪南是其皇储。
description.en: A dual monarchy in Central Europe from 1867 to 1918. Franz Ferdinand was its heir presumptive.

description.zh-cn: 奥匈帝国的地面部队。弗朗茨·斐迪南自幼加入并在其中服役，最终担任总司令。
description.en: The ground force of Austria-Hungary. Franz Ferdinand joined at a young age, served in it, and eventually became its Inspector General.

description.zh-cn: 一种婚姻制度，指地位悬殊的两人结婚后，其配偶和子女无法获得与丈夫同等的头衔、特权或财产继承权。弗朗茨·斐迪南的婚姻属此类。
description.en: A type of marriage between people of unequal social rank, which prevents the passage of the husband's titles and privileges to the wife and any children. The marriage of Franz Ferdinand was of this kind.

nodes.id: 马克西米利安·霍恩贝格

zh-cn: 马克西米利安·霍恩贝格

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南大公的长子，霍恩贝格公爵。因父母的贵贱通婚而无皇位继承权。
description.en: The eldest son of Archduke Franz Ferdinand, Duke of Hohenberg. He had no succession rights to the throne due to his parents' morganatic marriage.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南大公的女儿。因父母的贵贱通婚而无皇位继承权。
description.en: The daughter of Archduke Franz Ferdinand. She had no succession rights to the throne due to her parents' morganatic marriage.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南大公的次子。因父母的贵贱通婚而无皇位继承权。
description.en: The second son of Archduke Franz Ferdinand. He had no succession rights to the throne due to his parents' morganatic marriage.

description.zh-cn: 统治奥地利的王朝，弗朗茨·斐迪南是其成员。
description.en: The ruling house of Austria, of which Franz Ferdinand was a member.

nodes.id: 玛丽亚·特蕾莎 (布拉干萨)

zh-cn: 玛丽亚·特蕾莎 (布拉干萨)

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南的继母，两人关系非常亲近。
description.en: Franz Ferdinand's stepmother, with whom he had a very close relationship.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利末代皇帝，在弗朗茨·斐迪南遇刺后成为皇储。
description.en: The last Emperor of Austria, who became the heir presumptive after the assassination of Franz Ferdinand.

relationships.target: 奥地利的卡尔·路德维希 (1833-1896)

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南是卡尔·路德维希大公的长子。
description.en: Franz Ferdinand was the eldest son of Archduke Karl Ludwig.

relationships.target: 玛丽亚·安农齐亚塔 (两西西里公主)

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南是玛丽亚·安农齐亚塔的儿子。
description.en: Franz Ferdinand was the son of Maria Annunciata.

description.zh-cn: 于1900年与霍恩贝格女公爵苏菲结婚。
description.en: Married Sophie, Duchess of Hohenberg in 1900.

relationships.source: 马克西米利安·霍恩贝格

description.zh-cn: 马克西米利安是弗朗茨·斐迪南的儿子。
description.en: Maximilian was the son of Franz Ferdinand.

description.zh-cn: 苏菲是弗朗茨·斐迪南的女儿。
description.en: Sophie was the daughter of Franz Ferdinand.

description.zh-cn: 恩斯特是弗朗茨·斐迪南的儿子。
description.en: Ernst was the son of Franz Ferdinand.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南是弗兰茨·约瑟夫一世皇帝的侄子。
description.en: Franz Ferdinand was the nephew of Emperor Franz Joseph I.

relationships.target: 玛丽亚·特蕾莎 (布拉干萨)

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南与继母玛丽亚·特蕾莎关系亲近，视其为生母。
description.en: Franz Ferdinand had a close relationship with his stepmother, Maria Theresa, and regarded her as a true mother.

description.zh-cn: 自1896年起担任奥匈帝国皇储，直至1914年遇刺身亡。
description.en: Served as the Crown Prince of Austria-Hungary from 1896 until his assassination in 1914.

position.zh-cn: 中尉、上尉、上校、少将、总司令
position.en: Lieutenant, Captain, Colonel, Major General, Inspector General

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南14岁时加入奥匈陆军，并逐步晋升，最终成为军队总司令。
description.en: Franz Ferdinand joined the Austro-Hungarian Army at age 14, was progressively promoted, and eventually became its Inspector General.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南是哈布斯堡-洛林王朝的成员。
description.en: Franz Ferdinand was a member of the House of Habsburg-Lorraine.

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫皇太子在梅耶林惨案中自杀，使得弗朗茨·斐迪南成为奥匈帝国的皇位继承人。
description.en: The suicide of Crown Prince Rudolf in the Mayerling incident made Franz Ferdinand the heir presumptive to the Austro-Hungarian throne.

description.zh-cn: 由于弗朗茨·斐迪南主张将奥匈帝国改为包含斯拉夫地区的“三元联邦体制”，他受到了塞尔维亚民族主义者的憎恨。
description.en: Because Franz Ferdinand advocated for transforming Austria-Hungary into a 'Trialist' federal state including a Slavic entity, he was hated by Serbian nationalists.

description.zh-cn: 普林齐普在萨拉热窝刺杀了弗朗茨·斐迪南。
description.en: Princip assassinated Franz Ferdinand in Sarajevo.

description.zh-cn: 普林齐普在萨拉热窝刺杀了弗朗茨·斐迪南的妻子苏菲。
description.en: Princip assassinated Sophie, the wife of Franz Ferdinand, in Sarajevo.

description.zh-cn: 普林齐普的刺杀行为直接引发了萨拉热窝事件。
description.en: Princip's assassination directly caused the Sarajevo incident.

description.zh-cn: 萨拉热窝事件是第一次世界大战的导火线。
description.en: The Sarajevo incident was the catalyst for World War I.

relationships.target: 马克西米利安·霍恩贝格

description.zh-cn: 由于其父母的婚姻属于贵贱通婚，马克西米利安·霍恩贝格没有皇位继承权。
description.en: Due to his parents' morganatic marriage, Maximilian, Duke of Hohenberg had no succession rights to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 由于其父母的婚姻属于贵贱通婚，苏菲·冯·霍恩贝格没有皇位继承权。
description.en: Due to her parents' morganatic marriage, Princess Sophie of Hohenberg had no succession rights to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 由于其父母的婚姻属于贵贱通婚，恩斯特·冯·霍恩贝格没有皇位继承权。
description.en: Due to his parents' morganatic marriage, Prince Ernst of Hohenberg had no succession rights to the throne.

relationships.target: 鲁道夫 (奥匈帝国皇太子)

description.zh-cn: 鲁道夫皇太子自杀后，弗朗茨·斐迪南接替他成为皇储。
description.en: After Crown Prince Rudolf's suicide, Franz Ferdinand succeeded him as the heir presumptive.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗茨·斐迪南遇刺后，卡尔一世成为皇位继承人。
description.en: After Franz Ferdinand's assassination, Charles I became the heir to the throne.
